abstrac: Freelance writer, blogger, and content strategist for your parenting business
bio:
I'm a freelance writer specializing in parenting and pregnancy topics. I'm obsessed with baby gear, organic living, parenting trends, and fascinating stories about moms, kids, and families. 

* I specialize in blogging and content marketing for parenting businesses. The magic of blogging is in the comments, and bringing readers out to engage with your blog is my passion. I've written blogs and other content for various businesses in the parenting and pregnancy niches. I've also written email newsletters, press releases, brochures, and web content. 

* I'm a journalist published in numerous print magazines and websites, including Parenting, Pregnancy & Newborn, Mom.me, Mommyish, and Red Tricycle. I've written features, profiles, front-of-book, galleries, and department pieces. 

* I've got two kids, I play guitar, and I'm a fan of of the Oxford comma.
I bill a flat fee by the project.

abstrac: Programmer/sysadmin with over 10 years experience in IT, working both for public and private enterprises.
bio:
Programmed in C/C++, Python, Visual Basic/C, and other languages.

Developed HP-UX shell script to automatically configure large HP-UX system using Logical Volume Manager.

Wrote C program to simulate relativistic spaceflight using Einstein's special relativity equations and display the results using X windows programming tools.

Wrote C program to simulate single-stage-to-orbit space vehicle flight trajectory.

Set up Ethernet LANs in a mixed environment (Solaris, HP-UX, Windows NT); set up and configured DNS in such environments.

Set up and configured ATM network in a large heterogeneous environment (Solaris, HP-UX, AIX, SGI IRIX)

Developed a CD-ROM database and search/display program using Visual Basic
Rates are negotiable.  No reasonable offers refused.

abstrac: “Science Writing That Sells. By Doctors, For People.”
bio:
We only work for clients that want high quality scientific, nutritional, fitness, health or medical writing/consulting that gives results - websites that sell, books that get read and supplements that work!

The Med Writers is a team of experienced PhD-level medical writers led by me, Dr. Karen Vieira: a scientist with a PhD in Biomedical Sciences, an MS in Management and years of research experience in the food industry with Kraft Foods and in academia. All our medical writers are American scientists with writing training and medical writing experience.

Typical projects include medical writing, editing and proofreading, new supplement formulations  and consulting in medical, science and health fields. There is no job too big or small. Projects include articles, e-books, web copy, presentations, grant proposals, literature searches, textbooks, dissertation/thesis edits, sales letters, white papers, brochures, business plans, supplement formulations, consultations and more.

abstrac: North america's premier software development company!
bio:
22 YEARS, 50 DEVELOPERS, 900 CLIENTS, 100% N. AMERICAN OWNED

Since 2002, Papapoot has been creating an amazing variety of software for the world's most successful companies. Our reputation in the software industry has been earned slowly and honestly—one happy client at a time.

The best software is a marriage of business goals, design, and code. We specialize in multi-faceted, cross-platform projects with complex technical requirements, beautiful design, and grand business goals.

WE DO THE HARD STUFF!

Lets talk about your project. 

The best way to begin a conversation with us is by emailing us at  projects@papapoot.com. The information you provide will help us to have the most appropriate person contact you. Generally, we are able to respond to inquiries within 24 hours.

abstrac: I create custom pencil portraits from client photos. Each portrait is 100% hand drawn and customized to suit your needs.
bio: I began LeadHead in 2010 as a brand.  Each order is completed by me from start to finish.  I take pride in the work that I do, and will always give 110%. Everything is done using the highest quality professional materials.

There are no set business hours.  I work around the clock as needed to complete all incoming orders.  

Shipping: At this time, I only ship to customers in the US.  

Payment: Most of my work is paid upfront.  However, with a signed contract, we can make other arrangements for payment based on project milestones.
